#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long int 
int main()
{
int t,n;
ll o,d,last,n1;
cin >> t ;
while(t--) {
	cin >> n ;
	ll sum =0 ;
	while(n--) {
		cin >> d >> o ;
		n1 = o/d ;
		last = o - n1*d ;
		sum = sum + ((n1 + 1)*(o+last))/2 ;
		}
	if(sum % 2 == 0) cout << "NO" << endl ;
	else cout << "YES\n" ;
	}
return 0;
}
